content: Hello everyone, I would like to help to fill the examples in the FSHSchool website. Who do I speak to in order to do so?

Hi @João Almeida! This is exciting! We're currently tidying up some examples that we already had in the works -- but once we get those through (hopefully in the next few days), we'd love to have some examples from you! The basic approach to contributing examples is documented in the FSHOnline-Examples README. If you're comfortable using Git, then it shouldn't be too tricky. If you're new to using Git, we can try to help.

As noted above, however, it's probably best to wait until we merge in our currently in-progress example updates. That way you don't duplicate any work we've already done -- and that way we also don't end up w/ any conflicts due to you working off an older version.

Thanks again for asking (and being willing to help). We'll let you know (soon) when we're ready for your contributions!
Given the ubiquity and ease of FSH I would be happy to contribute to examples in the actual FHIR specification itself. Perhaps that’s a bridge too far :)

Got it! I will wait for the update and then I will add the rest!
Thanks for the info
